body.name: JolyWell Night Light for Kids, Egg Light for Nursery with 7 RGB Colors Changeable & Stepless Dimming, Rechargeable Tap Light with 1h Timer & Touch Control, Portable Night Light for Babies BPA Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 36 mins
features: Adorable Nursery Light for Breastfeeding: Night light is an essential item for your nursery.Touch feature makes it simple to turn on night light during middle night of feedings and diaper changes for breastfeeding new mothers.Soft light not only protect eyes but keep it dark to see just enough but also to keep baby sleepy.

Enchanting LED 7 Changing Colors: In RGB mode, the light glides through 7 RGB colors and 1 warm light color; tap once to fix your favorite color; memory function to resume at last setting.Light settings are super easy to get down, cute color light setting along with a warm, ambient light setting.

Long-Lasting Battery Life: With a single charge, baby night light lasts up to 100 or 5 hours in dimmest or brightest settings respectively; LED indicator blinks red when battery is low. 1H timer on the bottom helps save energy.

Smooth Touch Control: A simple short touch on the top of this baby night light bedside night light for power ON/OFF; Tap the top power button for brighter or dimmer. The touch sensor night light lamp, it’s great for relaxing background illumination.Small LED light helps locate the night lamp in standby mode.

Safe & BPA Free Material: Night light for babe is made from top-grade and safe PC, ABS plastic and BPA free material with a non-slip base for every surface & super-compact dimensions,which is pleasant haptic to ensure safety when your babies are playing.The anti-blue led light will never flicker or hurt your baby's eyes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nursery Night Light for Babies, an Indispensable Addition to Modern Households Let the JolyWell LED Night Lights illuminate your home and daily life as you embark on the journey of choosing the perfect night light.

1H Timer Setting Tap the logo twice to set a 1hr timer, the LED indicator will turn green when successfully set. Easy to find The LED indicator will slowly blink blue in standby mode for you to easily locate it in dark. Smooth Touch Control Tap to control the light, easy to operate, suitable for all ages Rechargeable Night Light The night light can last for 5-100 hours after being fully charged, easily meeting daily needs.
Night lights can aid relaxation before bed, reduce fear of the dark, and provide lighting at night for better visibility.
Our night light shines warm, soothing light to create a safe & comfortable atmosphere, get your baby sleep deeply throughout the night. Never wake your baby up even while breastfeeding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super simple to use!
reviews.reviewText: We love this Night Light, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This enchanting little light has quickly become an essential part of our nighttime routine, creating a calming and magical atmosphere for both children and adults alike. Here's why I believe this night light deserves a solid 5-star rating:Beautiful Design (5/5 stars):The design of the Joywell Night Light is simply breathtaking. The soft glow emitted by the light creates a serene ambiance in any room. The delicate and intricate details of the design, whether it's a whimsical animal or a magical scene, add a touch of wonder and charm to the surroundings. It's like having a piece of art that doubles as a night light.Soothing and Adjustable Light (5/5 stars):The light emitted by this night light is gentle and soothing, perfect for creating a calming environment for a good night's sleep. The adjustable brightness settings allow for customization, accommodating personal preferences and providing just the right amount of light for any occasion. Whether it's a soft glow for reading bedtime stories or a dim light to guide the way at night, this night light delivers.User-Friendly Features (5/5 stars):The night light itself is incredibly user-friendly. It's conveniently powered by rechargeable batteries, eliminating the need for constant battery replacements. The touch-sensitive controls make it easy to adjust the brightness or turn the light on and off with a simple tap. Additionally, the automatic timer function is a thoughtful addition, allowing the light to automatically turn off after a set period, saving energy and ensuring a peaceful night's sleep.Versatility (5/5 stars):This night light is versatile and can be used in various settings. It's a delightful addition to a child's bedroom, providing comfort and reassurance during the night. It can also be used as a soft accent light in living rooms or nurseries, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The versatility of this night light makes it suitable for all ages.Quality and Durability (5/5 stars):The quality and durability of the Joywell Light are exceptional. It is well-built and designed to withstand daily use. The materials used are of high quality and the craftsmanship is evident. It's a reliable and long-lasting product that brings joy and comfort for years to come.In summary, the light is a truly magical addition to any space. With its beautiful design, soothing light, user-friendly features, and versatility, it has become an indispensable part of our nighttime routine. Whether you're looking to create a serene environment for sleep or add a touch of wonder to your home, this night light delivers in every way. I highly recommend the Joywell Night Light to anyone seeking a delightful and enchanting lighting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little light for night feeds
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down my favorite and most used baby item to date. We have use this every single night for bottle feeding since birth. Still works great after 5 months. I originally bought an expensive Hatch and couldn't even get the thing to connect to the wifi (and you can't use the light function without WiFi) so I returned that stupid thing and bought this gem for a fraction of the price. Easy to use, battery lasts forever despite having it on for 2-3 hours each night and I maybe charge every three weeks. Will use as a nightlight for baby when he is bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Customer Service, Impressive Night Light!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the JolyWell Night Light for Kids, specifically the Egg Light design, and I must say I am thoroughly impressed with both the product and the outstanding customer service.Upon receiving the package, I eagerly set up the night light for my child, only to find that the first one was faulty and didn't work. Naturally, I was a bit disappointed, but my experience took a turn for the better when I contacted JolyWell's customer service.To my delight, they responded promptly and were incredibly understanding of the situation. They offered a hassle-free replacement without any additional cost, ensuring that my child would not be without their new night light for long. The replacement arrived quickly, and I am happy to report that it works perfectly.The Egg Light design itself is adorable, emitting a soft and comforting glow that's just right for creating a soothing atmosphere in my child's room. The build quality is impressive, and the materials used feel durable, assuring me of its longevity.What truly sets JolyWell apart, though, is their exceptional customer service. In an age where customer service can make or break a brand, JolyWell has demonstrated a commitment to customer satisfaction that is truly commendable. Their responsiveness and willingness to resolve issues promptly have earned my trust and loyalty.In conclusion, despite a minor hiccup with the initial product, I am thoroughly satisfied with the JolyWell Night Light for Kids, Egg Light. The combination of a delightful and functional product with top-notch customer service makes this purchase a five-star experience. I highly recommend JolyWell to anyone in search of quality products backed by a company that truly values its customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This has been key during middle of the night feedings
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this every night for the past 6 weeks postpartum. The battery seems to hold for a while. It is easy to use and I love that I can keep the light dim during the middle of the night. It's sturdy too. My toddler has thrown it around quite a bit and have had no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this!!
reviews.reviewText: We use this soooo much! It’s perfect for those late night baby feeds and changes! The dimming light is amazing and easy to use and the color settings are awesome! We do have dogs and their hair tends to cling to the light is my only complaint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just ok- however company has great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Update. I received a replacement from company after leaving review. New one came fast and works well. Thank youThis light worked well for about two weeks for me. Maybe it became faulty but it pisses me off! I got it for my newborn and night feed/ diaper changes. The design is great, love the changing colors, the dimmer on the regular light , the battery life . HOWEVER. After using it for a couple weeks it will just turn on by itself and to the brightest setting which wakes me, my husband and the baby up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for baby!
reviews.reviewText: A friend recommended this for me and I can’t be happier I got it! It’s the best little bedside friend for when I’m feeding/changing my newborn. It’s lightweight and can be placed anywhere. The small size makes it great for sitting near your baby without emitting lots of light. Love the dimmer factor and that everything is touch. Can’t say how much I have loved having this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars simple and last a long time!
reviews.reviewText: So so so good. Easy to turn on and off (just tap the top), easy to adjust brightness (tap and hold), and battery last super long. Use it every night and would buy again and will buy as a gift for others.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it so much I bought another.
reviews.reviewText: This light is great. It looks good, works awesome and is super handy. I bought it for a change table for nighttime diaper changes and liked it so much I bought another for nighttime nursing/feeding sessions. All three functions work great (regular dimming lamp, colourful light and nightlight function) and it’s small and portable. I love that it’s cordless. Can’t recommend this enough! Might be one of my favourite Amazon purchases.

reviews.reviewTitle: Es la segunda que compro y excelente
reviews.reviewText: La primera que compré solo era de luz blanca y cálida y súper bien hasta apenas le empezó a fallar el touch y eso por qué mi hijo lo tiró varias veces de una altura considerable pero ya tenía 2 años y medio de uso con caídas. La segunda la acabo de comprar hace 2 meses y súper bien aunque no me encanta que sea de colores aunque a mi hija le encanta y extraño que tenga tono blanco. Pero es excelente producto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This night light is very handy if you have babies or toddlers which you need to leave it on for. It had different colour options and is touch sensitive.

Super als Still- Nachtlicht , wenn die Mäuse in der Nacht Hunger haben man aber nicht das ganze Licht anschalten will. Ein Stern Abzug, da es nach langer Benutzung sehr schnell die Akkuleistung verliert und man es sehr oft neu auflauden muss

One of my favourite things we bought for our baby. Bubs is now 2 months old and we have used this every night since he was born. So handy for late-night feeds and changes without startling baby or waking up the rest of the house. I find I only need to recharge once a week or so.
